content: lion brand pattern # 50181 *clw-grannyscarf pdf* lion® wool article #820 *discontinued* 2 colors 158 yards each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge round 1 of square 1 = 2 inches \ 5 cm across square 1 = 5 x 5 \ 12 5 x 12 5 cm square 1 make 4 square 2 make 6 alternating squares sew squares into a strip add fringe to finish
